entry.string: Xaraya has a number of IRC chat rooms available at irc.xaraya.com. Our main support room can be found at #support. For your convenience we have provided this web based irc chat room access.
entry.translation: Xaraya hat eine Anzahl von IRC-Chatrooms auf irc.xaraya.com. Der Support findet statt bei #support. For your convenience we have provided this web based irc chat room access.
